オプション1:
Just a little water wasn’t enough—Star Man drank all the rainwater around him.
After that, he looked toward where the flying object had been, but it was nowhere to be seen.
(Maybe it was just the sunlight reflecting off the waves...)
As soon as he sat down to rest, he was struck by stomach pain and had diarrhea.
(Even so, I feel better than before I drank...)
(My head hurts too... but I think I can move a little.)
On the opposite side of the beach, there was a forest.
